description.example: Envío de resultados de Labflow a SmartLIS

data.code:
import ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v25.group.ORM_O01_ORDER;import ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v25.message.ORM_O01;
def msg = request.getBody(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message.class);
def terser = new ca.uhn.hl7v2.util.Terser(msg);
def tests = [:];ORM_O01 orm_o01 = (ORM_O01) msg;
def counter = 0;
for (ORM_O01_ORDER orderObservation : orm_o01.getORDERAll()) {
    def orc = orderObservation.getORC();
    def obr = orderObservation.getORDER_DETAIL().getOBR();
    tests[counter++] = [
        "test_code":obr.getObr4_UniversalServiceIdentifier().getCe1_Identifier().getValue(),
        "test_name":obr.getObr4_UniversalServiceIdentifier().getCe2_Text().getValue(),
        "sample_key": orc.getOrc4_PlacerGroupNumber().getName(),
        "sample_name": null,
        "container": null,
        "result": null,
        "result_date": null
    ]
};
def json = [
    order_number_source: terser.get("/ORDER/ORC-2-1"),
    order_number: terser.get("/ORDER/ORC-2-1"),order_comment: null,
    order_status: null,
    order_date: terser.get("/MSH-7-1"),
    order_source: terser.get("/MSH-3-1"),
    nif: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-20-1"),
    nhc: null, firstname: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-5-2"),
    lastname: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-5-1"),
    lastname2: null,
    birthdate: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-7-1"),
    address: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-11-1"),
    sex: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-8-1"),
    phone: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-13-1"),
    physician: terser.get("/ORDER/ORC-12-1-1"),
    physician_name: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-9-1-1") + terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-9-2-1"),
    physician_esp_name: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-20-2-1"),
    domain: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-2"),
    type: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-2"),
    area: null,
    area_name: null,
    priority: null,
    bed: null,
    collpoint: null,
    inscomp: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-20-1-1"),
    collpoint_name: null,
    tests: tests
];  return new com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper().writeValueAsString(json);

            <from uri="netty:tcp://0.0.0.0:8892?decoders=toHl7Decoder&encoders=fromHl7Encoder&clientMode%3Dfalse%26disconnect%3Dfalse%26encoding%3DISO-8859-1%26keepAlive%3Dtrue%26sync%3Dtrue"/>
    <unmarshal><hl7/></unmarshal>
    <to uri="direct:e2a40161-ccbe-49f7-b9e4-2979bd3e4d2d" />
</route><route id="4fbf14a1-450e-4880-b624-cb3119bbc5b9" group=""><description>Fin Flujo</description>
    <from uri="direct:4fbf14a1-450e-4880-b624-cb3119bbc5b9"/>
    
    <setBody>
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[<ACK
    xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v2xml"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v2xml ACK.xsd">
    <MSH>
        <MSH.1>|</MSH.1>
        <MSH.2>^~\&</MSH.2>
        <MSH.3>
            <HD.1>HIS</HD.1>
        </MSH.3>
        <MSH.4>
            <HD.1>HOSPITAL</HD.1>
        </MSH.4>
        <MSH.5>
            <HD.1>BBANK</HD.1>
        </MSH.5>
        <MSH.6>
            <HD.1>EXTERNO</HD.1>
        </MSH.6>
        <MSH.7>
            <TS.1>20190429090131</TS.1>
        </MSH.7>
        <MSH.9>
            <MSG.1>ACK</MSG.1>
            <MSG.3>ACK</MSG.3>
        </MSH.9>
            <MSH.10></MSH.10>
        <MSH.11>
            <PT.1>P</PT.1>
        </MSH.11>
        <MSH.12>
            <VID.1>2.5</VID.1>
        </MSH.12>
    </MSH>
    <MSA>
        <MSA.1>AA</MSA.1>
        <MSA.2>123456</MSA.2>
    </MSA>
</ACK>]]>
        </simple>
    </setBody>
    
    <to uri="mock:end4fbf14a1-450e-4880-b624-cb3119bbc5b9"/>
</route><route id="e2a40161-ccbe-49f7-b9e4-2979bd3e4d2d" group=""><description>File Output</description>
    <from uri="direct:e2a40161-ccbe-49f7-b9e4-2979bd3e4d2d"/>
    <to uri="file://C:\tmp?allowNullBody%3Dtrue%26bufferSize%3D131072%26fileExist%3DOverride"/>
    <to uri="direct:4fbf14a1-450e-4880-b624-cb3119bbc5b9" />
</route></routes>

data.example:
<routes  xmlns="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring"><route> <from uri="mllp://0.0.0.0:8888"/> <multicast> <to uri="direct:e9d0cc1a-ce57-4125-9857-d5a89a3eedad"/> </multicast></route><route> <from uri="direct:e9d0cc1a-ce57-4125-9857-d5a89a3eedad"/> <setBody>  <groovy>import ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v25.group.ORM_O01_ORDER;import ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v25.message.ORM_O01;
def msg = request.getBody(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message.class);
def terser = new ca.uhn.hl7v2.util.Terser(msg);
def tests = [:];ORM_O01 orm_o01 = (ORM_O01) msg;
def counter = 0;
for (ORM_O01_ORDER orderObservation : orm_o01.getORDERAll()) {
    def orc = orderObservation.getORC();
    def obr = orderObservation.getORDER_DETAIL().getOBR();
    tests[counter++] = [
        "test_code":obr.getObr4_UniversalServiceIdentifier().getCe1_Identifier().getValue(),
        "test_name":obr.getObr4_UniversalServiceIdentifier().getCe2_Text().getValue(),
        "sample_key": orc.getOrc4_PlacerGroupNumber().getName(),
        "sample_name": null,
        "container": null,
        "result": null,
        "result_date": null
    ]
};
def json = [
    order_number_source: terser.get("/ORDER/ORC-2-1"),
    order_number: terser.get("/ORDER/ORC-2-1"),order_comment: null,
    order_status: null,
    order_date: terser.get("/MSH-7-1"),
    order_source: terser.get("/MSH-3-1"),
    nif: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-20-1"),
    nhc: null, firstname: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-5-2"),
    lastname: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-5-1"),
    lastname2: null,
    birthdate: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-7-1"),
    address: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-11-1"),
    sex: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-8-1"),
    phone: terser.get("/PATIENT/PID-13-1"),
    physician: terser.get("/ORDER/ORC-12-1-1"),
    physician_name: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-9-1-1") + terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-9-2-1"),
    physician_esp_name: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-20-2-1"),
    domain: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-2"),
    type: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-2"),
    area: null,
    area_name: null,
    priority: null,
    bed: null,
    collpoint: null,
    inscomp: terser.get("/PATIENT/PATIENT_VISIT/PV1-20-1-1"),
    collpoint_name: null,
    tests: tests
];  return new com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper().writeValueAsString(json);</groovy>    </setBody> <multicast> <to uri="direct:f67afb3a-a817-4ae6-988d-1f802b98cf96"/> </multicast> </route><route> <from uri="direct:cb4b97ba-2228-45ce-b019-07fd39504d34"/> <to uri="log:debug"/> </route><route> <from uri="direct:f67afb3a-a817-4ae6-988d-1f802b98cf96"/> <setBody>  <>import ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v25.group.ORM_O01_ORDER
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
import groovy.json.JsonParserType

//Login to SL
def msg = request.getBody()
def post = new URL("http://10.10.1.34/system/login/").openConnection()
def message = '{"usr":"suser","pwd":"smartlis"}'

post.setRequestMethod("POST")
post.setDoOutput(true)
post.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/json")
post.getOutputStream().write(message.getBytes("UTF-8"))
def postRC = post.getResponseCode()

def parser = new JsonSlurper()
def parser1 = new JsonSlurper()
if (postRC.equals(200)) { //If Login Succesfull

    def session = post.getInputStream().getText()
    def json = parser.parseText(session)
    msg = parser1.parseText(msg)
    def exec = ["job_info": ["name"  : "ORDER_CREATE: " + msg["order_number"],"param1": msg["order_number"]],"work_sess_id": json["data"]["new_sess_key"],"space_code": "","exec": [:]]
    def commandCounter = 1
    def newOrder = ["cmd": "new", "id": msg["order_number"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  newOrder
    def newOrderCommand = ["cmd": "modify_order_data", "field": "order_source", "data": json["order_source"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  newOrderCommand
    def addOrderDemographicCommand1 = ["cmd": "modify_order_data", "field": "physician_name", "data": json["physician_name"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  addOrderDemographicCommand1
    def addOrderDemographicCommand2 = ["cmd": "modify_order_data", "field": "physician", "data": json["physician"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  addOrderDemographicCommand2
    def addOrderDemographicCommand3 = ["cmd": "modify_order_data", "field": "pat_name", "data": json["lastname"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] = addOrderDemographicCommand3 
    def addOrderDemographicCommand4 = ["cmd": "modify_order_data", "field": "pat_name", "data": json["lastname"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  addOrderDemographicCommand4
    def addOrderDemographicCommand11 = ["cmd": "modify_order_data", "field": "source", "data": msg["order_source"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  addOrderDemographicCommand11
    def col1lp1oint = ["cmd"  : "modify_order_data","field": "collpoint","data" : "5006"]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  col1lp1oint
    def ins1comp = ["cmd"  : "modify_order_data","field": "inscomp","data" : "CEY-262"]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  ins1comp
    def coll_name = ["cmd"  : "modify_order_data","field": "collpoint_name","data" : msg["order_source"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  coll_name
    def source = ["cmd"  : "modify_order_data","field": "source","data" : msg["order_source"]]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  source

    if (msg["tests"] != null) {
        for (def genTestIndex in msg["tests"]) {
            def genTest =  genTestIndex.collect([] as HashSet){entry -> entry.value}
             
            def addGenTestCommand = ["cmd": "add_test2", "test_code":genTestIndex.collect({entry -> entry.value.test_code})[0] ]
            
            if (genTest && genTest["comment"] != null && genTest["comment"] != "") {
            
            }
            exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  addGenTestCommand
        }
    }

    def saveCommand = ["cmd": "save", "async_mode": "false"]
    exec["exec"][commandCounter++] =  saveCommand
    return new com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper().writeValueAsString(exec)
}</>    </setBody> <multicast> <to uri="direct:cb4b97ba-2228-45ce-b019-07fd39504d34"/> </multicast> </route></routes>

	"id2": "Que Tal"
}]]>

    <unmarshal>

    </unmarshal>
    <multicast>
        <to uri="direct:7c520e85-c4ab-4841-ae54-7920460f2bdd"/>

</route><route  id="98b99a7b-2626-43e3-9904-19796fc38758"> <from uri="direct:98b99a7b-2626-43e3-9904-19796fc38758"/> <to uri="log:debug"/> </route><route  id="14513aa1-c541-47fd-92d8-cb554a4851c7">

    <multicast>

    </multicast>
</route><route  id="7c520e85-c4ab-4841-ae54-7920460f2bdd">

        </simple>
    </setBody>
    <multicast>
        <to uri="direct:98b99a7b-2626-43e3-9904-19796fc38758"/>
    </multicast>
</route></routes>
